summary.span: 代表不可變的陣列，意即在建立該陣列之後，就無法加以變更。

span.span: Represents an array that is immutable; meaning it cannot be changed once it is created.

summary.span: **NuGet 套件**：System.Collections.Immutable (關於固定集合及其安裝方法)

span.span: **NuGet package**: System.Collections.Immutable (about immutable collections and how to install)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有不同的案例最適合和其他人的最佳。There are different scenarios best for and others best for . 若要使用的不可變陣列的原因：Reasons to use immutable array: - 更新的資料很少發生，或項目數目會變得很小 （少於 16 個項目）Updating the data is rare or the number of elements is quite small (less than 16 items) - 您必須要能夠在效能關鍵區段中的資料上反覆運算You need to be able to iterate over the data in performance critical sections - 您有不可變集合的執行個體數目，而且不得將資料保留在樹狀結構You have many instances of immutable collections and you can’t afford keeping the data in trees 若要使用的不可變清單的原因：Reasons to use immutable list: - 更新的資料很常見，或不預期的元素數目很小Updating the data is common or the number of elements isn’t expected to be small - 更新集合是多個效能嚴重不足比逐一查看的內容Updating the collection is more performance critical than iterating the contents 下表摘要說明的效能特性 The following table summarizes the performance characteristics of ||||| |-|-|-|-| |**作業****Operation**| 複雜度 Complexity| 複雜度 Complexity|**註解****Comments**| |**Item****Item**|O （1)O(1)|O (log n)O(log n)|直接基礎陣列中的索引Directly index into the underlying array| |**Add()****Add()**|O （n)O(n)|O (log n)O(log n)|需要建立新的陣列Requires creating a new array|

span.span: This type is thread safe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的項目類型的陣列可以轉換成基底項目類型的陣列，而不需要重新配置陣列。Arrays of derived elements types can be cast to arrays of base element types without reallocating the array. 向上轉型成為的項目以建立方法可以使用反轉方法。Upcasts of element created with the method can be reversed using the method. 不過，向下轉型成功時才它會反轉先前的向上轉型。However, a downcast is only successful when it reverses a prior upcast. 作業。operation.

summary.span: 建立可變動的陣列，其具有與此陣列相同的內容，而且能夠使用標準變動介面，有效率地跨多個作業進行變動。

span.span: Creates a mutable array that has the same contents as this array and can be efficiently mutated across multiple operations using standard mutable interfaces.

returns.span: 新的產生器，含有與這個陣列相同的內容。

span.span: The new builder with the same contents as this array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是 o （1） 作業，而且會導致只有單一 （小型） 的記憶體配置。This is an O(1) operation and results in only a single (small) memory allocation. 傳回可變動清單不是安全執行緒。The mutable list that is returned is not thread-safe.
